resources.string: Hello, I am Luiz and I\'m an Android Developer.\\nThe first version of this app was published for iOS by Tiago Rodrigues ([Github](https://github.com/tigpt)), and I decided to create a version for Android as well.\\nNew AWS services are released all the time, and sometimes you just want a quick dictionary definition.\\nThis app is a great AWS Cloud Consultant companion tool and I hope it\'s useful for you.\\nIf you want to help, you are more than welcome to [buy me a coffee](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/lzcalderaro).\\nFollow me on: \\n[Github](https://github.com/lzcalderaro) and \\n[Twitter](https://twitter.com/luizcalderaro)
Feedback emails are lovely to read!
